description.zh-cn: 中国东汉末年军阀刘备势力的将领。
description.en: A general serving under the warlord Liu Bei during the late Eastern Han dynasty of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国东汉末年军阀，蜀汉的开国皇帝。时任左将军领益州牧。
description.en: A warlord in the late Eastern Han dynasty and the founding emperor of Shu Han. He held the titles of General of the Left and Governor of Yi Province at the time.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上继西汉之后的大一统王朝，传八世共十四帝，享国一百九十五年。亦称后汉。
description.en: A unified dynasty in Chinese history following the Western Han, lasting for 195 years with fourteen emperors over eight generations. Also known as the Later Han.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代重要将军名号。
description.en: An important title for generals in ancient China.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的地理划分，汉代十三州之一。
description.en: A geographical division in ancient China, one of the thirteen provinces of the Han dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国东汉末年权臣、军阀，曹魏政权的奠基者。时任丞相。
description.en: A powerful minister and warlord in the late Eastern Han dynasty of China, and the founder of the state of Cao Wei. He held the title of Chancellor at the time.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国陕西省的地理区域，在建安二十四年（219年）是刘备与曹操争夺的战略要地。
description.en: A geographical region in Shaanxi Province, China, which was a strategic point of contention between Liu Bei and Cao Cao in the year 219.

description.zh-cn: 中国东汉末年至三国时代蜀汉的著名将领，时任征西将军。
description.en: A famous general of Shu Han during the late Eastern Han dynasty and Three Kingdoms period of China. He held the title of General Who Conquers the West at the time.

description.zh-cn: 中国东汉末年至三国时代蜀汉的著名将领。
description.en: A famous general of Shu Han during the late Eastern Han dynasty and Three Kingdoms period of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国东汉末年至三国时代蜀汉的将领，时任沔阳长。
description.en: A general of Shu Han during the late Eastern Han dynasty and Three Kingdoms period of China. He was the Magistrate of Mianyang at the time.

description.zh-cn: 元末明初小说家，历史小说《三国演义》的作者。
description.en: A novelist from the late Yuan and early Ming dynasties, author of the historical novel 'Romance of the Three Kingdoms'.

description.zh-cn: 中国四大名著之一，由罗贯中创作的长篇历史小说。
description.en: One of the Four Great Classical Novels of Chinese literature, a historical novel written by Luo Guanzhong.

description.zh-cn: 中国东汉末年曹操麾下的重要将领。
description.en: An important general serving under Cao Cao during the late Eastern Han dynasty of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国东汉末年至三国时代曹魏的著名将领。
description.en: A famous general of Cao Wei during the late Eastern Han dynasty and Three Kingdoms period of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国三国时期蜀汉丞相，杰出的政治家、军事家。
description.en: The Chancellor of Shu Han during the Three Kingdoms period of China, an outstanding statesman and military strategist.

description.zh-cn: 中国东汉末年至三国时代曹魏的著名将领。
description.en: A famous general of Cao Wei during the late Eastern Han dynasty and Three Kingdoms period of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国东汉末年至三国时代曹魏的将领。
description.en: A general of Cao Wei during the late Eastern Han dynasty and Three Kingdoms period of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国东汉末年至三国时代蜀汉的将领，刘备的养子。
description.en: A general of Shu Han during the late Eastern Han dynasty and Three Kingdoms period of China, the adopted son of Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 中国东汉末年至三国时代的将领，曾先后效力于刘璋、刘备和曹魏。
description.en: A general during the late Eastern Han dynasty and Three Kingdoms period of China, who served successively under Liu Zhang, Liu Bei, and Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 长江最长的支流，在汉中之战中是重要战场。
description.en: The longest tributary of the Yangtze River, an important battlefield during the Hanzhong Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 位于汉中的县，汉中之战时是曹操的军事据点。
description.en: A county in Hanzhong, which served as Cao Cao's military base during the Hanzhong Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 张著是刘备势力的将领，参与了建安二十四年（219年）的汉中之战。
description.en: Zhang Zhu was a general in Liu Bei's forces and participated in the Hanzhong Campaign in the year 219.

description.zh-cn: 刘备在汉中之战期间担任左将军。
description.en: Liu Bei held the title of General of the Left during the Hanzhong Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 刘备在汉中之战期间担任益州牧，管辖益州地区。
description.en: Liu Bei served as the Governor of Yi Province during the Hanzhong Campaign, governing the Yi Province region.

description.zh-cn: 建安二十四年（219年），刘备与曹操为争夺汉中而展开战斗。
description.en: In the year 219, Liu Bei and Cao Cao fought for control over Hanzhong.

description.zh-cn: 黄忠是刘备麾下将领，时任征西将军。
description.en: Huang Zhong was a general under Liu Bei, holding the title of General Who Conquers the West.

description.zh-cn: 赵云是刘备麾下的重要将领。
description.en: Zhao Yun was an important general serving under Liu Bei.

description.zh-cn: 在汉中之战中，张著作战受伤，赵云驰马返回营地接应并成功救出张著。
description.en: During the Battle of Hanzhong, Zhang Zhu was wounded in combat, and Zhao Yun rode back to the camp to reinforce and successfully rescue him.

description.zh-cn: 在汉中之战中，黄忠出击逾期未归，赵云率数十骑出营接应，并从曹操大军的包围中救出黄忠。
description.en: During the Battle of Hanzhong, when Huang Zhong did not return from a sortie on time, Zhao Yun led dozens of cavalry out of the camp to provide support and rescued Huang Zhong from the encirclement of Cao Cao's main army.

description.zh-cn: 在汉中之战中，赵云率部与曹操大军正面交锋，并使用空城计将其击退。
description.en: During the Battle of Hanzhong, Zhao Yun led his troops to confront Cao Cao's main army and repelled them using the empty fort strategy.

description.zh-cn: 在汉中之战中，当赵云被曹军追击至营寨时，时任沔阳长的张翼正在赵云营内。
description.en: During the Battle of Hanzhong, when Zhao Yun was pursued by Cao's army to his camp, Zhang Yi, then Magistrate of Mianyang, was inside Zhao Yun's camp.

description.zh-cn: 罗贯中是历史小说《三国演义》的作者。
description.en: Luo Guanzhong is the author of the historical novel 'Romance of the Three Kingdoms'.

description.zh-cn: 根据小说《三国演义》的描述，在汉水之战中，张著担任黄忠的副将。
description.en: According to the novel 'Romance of the Three Kingdoms', Zhang Zhu served as Huang Zhong's vice general during the Battle of the Han River.

description.zh-cn: 根据小说《三国演义》的描述，黄忠在定军山之战中斩杀了夏侯渊。
description.en: According to the novel 'Romance of the Three Kingdoms', Huang Zhong killed Xiahou Yuan in the Battle of Mount Dingjun.

description.zh-cn: 根据小说《三国演义》的描述，在汉水之战中，黄忠与张郃的部队发生混战。
description.en: According to the novel 'Romance of the Three Kingdoms', Huang Zhong's troops clashed with Zhang He's in a chaotic battle at the Han River.

description.zh-cn: 根据小说《三国演义》的描述，在汉水之战中，张著突围时被文聘拦住去路。
description.en: According to the novel 'Romance of the Three Kingdoms', during the Battle of the Han River, Zhang Zhu's path was blocked by Wen Pin while trying to break out.
